text: Malek Salama (born 1 February 1997, Cairo, Egypt) is an Egyptian karateka. He is a member of the Egyptian Karate national team He Represented his country in several competetions including world,Continental and Karate1, In 2013 he won his first World Gold Medal at the World Karate Championship In 2019 he represented Egypt at the 2019 African Games and he won the gold medal in the men's kumite 60 kg event. At the 2018 Mediterranean Games he won one of the bronze medals in the men's kumite 60 kg event.https://www.karaterec.com/en/contests/world-junior-and-cadet- championships-2013/ == References == Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Egyptian male karateka Category:Competitors at the 2018 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games bronze medalists for Egypt Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in karate Category:Competitors at the 2019 African Games Category:African Games medalists in karate Category:African Games gold medalists for Egypt
title: Malek Salama
